Co-Founder, Software Engineer • Mar, 2017 — Present

Frenzy identifies and tags brand-specific products in photographs. Using deep learning and computer vision, it's able to parse through each item in a web image to determine the exact brand, SKU, and where it can be purchased.

  • Built a process for parsing RSS feed and scraping articles from it, kept tracking of 150+ fashion blogs’ updates for one month till now. Sped up article scraping for collecting training data for visual search algorithm (Neural Network).

L3 & L1 Software Engineer • Mar, 2013 — Mar, 2015

StarPoint is the China’s leading R&D and manufacturer of communications test set, which is the partner of Key Laboratory of Universal wireless communications. I did my graduate research here.

  • Invented two patents jointly, one about codec of TTCN-3 based system, and the other about PHICH processing.
